articles.title: Problem of homelessness in Traveller community highlighted at webinar
articles.description: While 22 per cent of Travellers in the southwest could be classified as homeless, more than 85 per cent were either homeless or in insecure and inadequate accommodation, a webinar heard on Tuesday.
